text: East Thames Limited (formerly East Thames Group) is a housing association based in East London, England. It is one of the G15, a club of the largest associations in London. In 2016 it was in three-way merger discussions to form the largest housing association in Europe, but one of the other associations (Hyde Group) withdrew. Discussions continued with London and Quadrant, and they merged on 6 December 2016. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Housing associations based in England Category:Organisations based in London
title: East Thames housing association
